Detailed Description

VSynonym the Param Type of the VSynonymDictionary.

It can hold the Synonym Entry list after query synonym from VSynonymContainer.

Author:
vernkin

Member Function Documentation

char* VSynonym::getHeadWord ( int  index  )  [inline]

Return the head word(entry word or first word in a line) which is placed on index. In fact, It is exactly same with getWord( index, 0 ).

Parameters:
index in range of 0 to getMatchedCount()-1
Returns:
first word in the ith lap.

References getWord().

vtnum_t VSynonym::getMatchedCount (  )  [inline]

Return the count of lines including query used in searching.

Returns:
number of the synonym entries matched

Referenced by size(), and testLoop().

vtnum_t VSynonym::getSynonymCount ( int  index  )  [inline]

After calling getMatchedCount( ), it is called for iterating whole synonyms within a line. This method won't take bound check.

Parameters:
index in range of 0 to getMatchedCount()-1
Returns:
the num of synonyms in the indexth synonym entry

References VT_NUM_LEN, and VT_OFFSET_LEN.

Referenced by size(), and testLoop().
